releaseNotes: MAJOR IMPROVEMENT: Generic filename system - no more NSSM configuration changes
MAJOR IMPROVEMENT: Registry-based version tracking instead of filename parsing
MAJOR IMPROVEMENT: Dynamic backup detection of actual running executable
CRITICAL FIX: Eliminates service configuration corruption during updates
Enhanced reliability - service always points to same filename
Enterprise-grade update system with proper backup and rollback

added: Self-update system with automatic version checking
Intelligent Event ID tracking and duplicate prevention
Base64 encoding for registry data to prevent corruption
fixed: USB device persistence issues on service restart
JSON corruption in Windows Registry storage
Excessive logging noise from USB monitoring
improved: Event Log scanning with smart lookback periods

updateInstructions: Service will automatically check for updates on startup
Critical updates will be applied automatically
Non-critical updates require manual approval or service restart
Backup of current version is automatically created before update
